website_summaries.verdict: The Belkin Ultimate Keyboard Case might be the best way to turn your iPad into the closest thing to a laptop alternative, offering protection and not much bulk.
pros: Thin form, excellent keyboard, case automatically turns on and off, multiple viewing angles, offers solid iPad protection
cons: It's unclear how the plastic construction will hold up over time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect iPad 2 companion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case/keyboard combo as an early Christmas gift for myself and I have no regrets. It was between this case and the Logitech Zagg aluminum case. Ultimately I chose this case because in looking at the Zagg case it appears that there is quite a lip surrounding the keyboard. I could see that getting in the way of typing. Also, the reviews for the Zagg case indicated that the aluminum dented easily. The fold-away keyboard is a nice size and the key spacing is perfect. Couple that with the convenience of folding the keyboard away when you don't need it and this is the perfect case/keyboard combo.
customer_reviews.author: Sheaman

customer_reviews.title: Great case if you like the portfolio design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product because it is much cheaper and better quality than most others I have seen. Are there better keyboards than this? Yes...but you're going to pay a lot more for it. This connects great and feels like a good quality keyboard. I've had it for 2 years now and have typed all my notes in school with it. The battery lasts long. My only criticism is that it's hard to charge the iPad because of how they have the port so I usually take out the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: patrick630

customer_reviews.title: Junk from Belkin
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing from this Folio case was a bluetooth keyboard. I had to cut the keyboard out because its not deatachable. Who wants to have a fixed position. Its stupid and not confortable design. So the case went directly to trash can, because its was poor quality and it stinks. This was my worste purchase that I made from Belkin. Go look for other cases that has flexible design and made of good quality materials not some kind of chinese chemical crap.
customer_reviews.author: Greenkiss

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad Product EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this product for over 2 years and decided to write this review. This has been the absolute best iPad accessory. It functions so well as a keyboard, a protective case and a kickstand. I have used this day in and day out for 2 years now and it still functions and appears (for the most part) like it did the day I got it. It links up easily through Bluetooth every time and I'm always amazed at how long the battery lasts. I think I charge it once every 2 weeks for a couple of hours. If you looking for an iPad case & keyboard, look no further... this is certainly the one.
customer_reviews.author: GCS

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews for all the iPad keyboards I could find and the buyers all had good things and bad things to say about each one.I had a customer with the Belkin and he really liked it so in lieu of a clear winner, I decided to get the Belkin on his recommendation. It was easy to set up, easy to carry, not slippery,a bit convoluted to unfold but you get used to it, but I love the keypad. I am not a traditional typer and I find the keys easier to use than a standard keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Awkward, bluetooth problem
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this! It's extremely awkward to set up and especially to charge. It doesn't sit up well and it tends to slip when it's standing up - it actually fell over several times. The bluetooth has a mind of its own and works sporadically. I had to hit 'forget this device" and start over several times. I finally had had enough and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D

customer_reviews.title: Frail power connector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to go with a new iPad2. Worked great until the initial charge wore off (about five minutes.) Charge light indicator does not come on when plugged in, connection is mechanically flimsy. All keyboard/folio combos are a compromise, you can get a real keyboard from Apple and a nicer folio for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Horace James

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not long term
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this product is it's downfall. It's light and keeps your ipad profile slim. But to achieve this there is no hard plastic keeping your ipad where it should be (in the sleeve). If you're a rough user and a user who will occasionally take the ipad out, you'll probably get two or three years of function from this before the ipad keeps slipping your. It got frustrating so I just took my ipad out... And I bought a chrome book (best decision ever)
customer_reviews.author: Micky Q

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Few Issues
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Quality material, good keyboard battery life, shortcut keys are very handy, thin compact case, keyboard is removable for easy typing, makes using the iPad extremely more powerful in business Cons: Having to repair can be annoying randomly after iPad wakes, carrying iPad can be awkward and keys are easily accidentally pressed, magnetic clasp does not hold iPad closed very well at all, iPad slips down from case and has to be readjusted once a day, no where to put keyboard when using camera- keyboard just awkwardly hangs out- again causing accidental button pushing.
customer_reviews.author: RoofCore International

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard feels just like my laptop keyboard and not cramped up like how I imagined a mobile keyboard would be. The cover is non-magnetic, which is not a big con, but it does its work of shielding your iPad screen from elements. However, as it is rather thin, I doubt it would be able to protect your iPad from sharp objects. On the whole, I would recommend this to anyone who needs a keyboard and needs to bring their iPad around. Protection wise, it is minimal but does a pretty neat job.
customer_reviews.author: spaltx

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who has an ipad2 , It did not fit correctly, so I was disappointed, but now that she has purchased the new ipad4, the Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard seems to work just fine for her. The problem was the desig, the open slots did not match up. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Patten

customer_reviews.title: Good case and keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and the keyboard has great response. I just needed a case that had a removable keyboard for additional positioning and for times when I did not need to carry a keyboard around with me.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde Curls

customer_reviews.title: too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This was nice for two days then it was just to bulky and heavy to deal with during traveling. I would not buy it nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice and not too big
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Does add a litte weight but not much. Wont let you fold the keyboard onto the screen so you dont have to worry about scratching the screen. You will get exactly what you expect on this purchase. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: DerekW

customer_reviews.title: Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased right after I bought my IPAD. It is very functional and thought the price was fair after comparison shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Rue8309

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful case!
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what the description said. It is a little bit bulkier than most cases because of the keyboard but I still would have to carry a keyboard which is just as bulky. I also didn't want a keyboard on top of the iPad screen so this worked perfectly. The keyboard paired easily with my iPad and I haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Nice....
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard... my biggest complaint is that it doesn't turn vertical. Usually you want it landscape for typing anyway. The bluetooth seems to sleep also, and takes a second to wake and reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Good Guy Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my grandson as a graduation gift. He loves it. He plays games, reads, and with Apple's "Pages" he even types papers and takes notes. It is always in his backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not what the video showed it to be..
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because it was not what the pictures and video showed it to be. Tried 3 times to get the one depicted in the video, finally quit trying.
customer_reviews.author: doyle184

customer_reviews.title: Nice Option for Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent option for a case that stands on its own with or without the keyboard down which is why I purchased this product. The only drawbacks are that it is not very stable and is hard to balance on your lap. I am also concerned that the velcro fasteners which hold the keyboard up are pulling off already after a few weeks of use. So could there be a better option? Yes, but is one out there? I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Welch

customer_reviews.title: ipad keyboard folio
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard feel. Easy to sync. Compact. Easy to use. Good viewing angle. Experience consistent with tech reviews found online prior to purchase. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: dick

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the iPad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to complement my Apple iPad 2. I like the convenience and functionality of the bluetooth keyboard and the leather case is protective and attractive. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great folio and keypad
customer_reviews.text: This folio is very protective. The keyboard feels substantial when typing. I highly recommend this to turn your iPad into a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kay

customer_reviews.title: belkin bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my new Ipad3 and it works great. Sometimes have issues with the Ipad slipping down just a little when using keyboard which makes connecting the charging cable tricky but it is probably user error!. Keyboard is easy to type on and very comfortable.I would recommend this to others and would buy it again. Battery life on the keyboard is great
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good design and durable
customer_reviews.text: Removable Bluetooth keyboard, light weight. Good battery life. The cover is well designed offering position choices to suit various configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I like that my keyboard is not always visible, only when I want it to be. I can't find anything I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent functionality
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has made my iPad much more versatile and useful. It's well designed, easy to use, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: J.c. Beaglehole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard and accessory
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard folio for Ipad was exactly what I was looking for! I actually enjoy typing on my IPAD! It is solid, connects seamelessly, and has modified itself to be extra friendly to ipad. Only con is it is very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Fit
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward fit... Doesn't sit up right for typing...not worth the money and the material feels cheap. Honestly you're better off getting a smart cover for $30 at the Apple store and learning how to use the virtual keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: hherc

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is great
customer_reviews.text: The cover is sort of flimsy. It also gets dirty easily and is difficult to clean. I considered returning because of the price, but help on to it. I would consider another brand.n the keyboard itself is awesome and holds a charge for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Benton

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Connects easily and reliably and the keys have a soft touch. It also folds away easily when not needed. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Will P.

customer_reviews.title: Good, flexible case
customer_reviews.text: I have had the case for a few weeks now. It is relatively light, has a detachable keyboard, and it protects the iPad unlike some other cases. They keyboard is smaller than a regular laptop or desktop but you can get used to it really quick.
customer_reviews.author: LEM

customer_reviews.title: too much lag
customer_reviews.text: There is too much lag when the keyboard is being used to type stuff over an internet connection. Ergonomics are decent considering it's a small keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ambler

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: The best flip keyboard because it acts as a case and a keyboard, no need for an extra sleeve, also comes with a stylus. The keyboard connects via blue tooth and has to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: John Baxter Taylor Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great accessibility...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband's new iPad gift, and the keyboard works well for him. He likes the easy accessibility of the iPad, although sometimes it can slide out. Not too clumsy, it works for him.
customer_reviews.author: qbones

customer_reviews.title: Belkin F5L090tt Keyboard Folio iPad 2 and 3
customer_reviews.text: this one Belkin F5L090tt Keyboard Folio iPad 2 and 3 is OK, not bad but i would not recommendation to anyone
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Too Hefty
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a good idea to add a keyboard but this whole item is too bulky and your extremely limited in the viewing angles. Just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amond Parks

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again - want my money back
customer_reviews.text: The connectivity of the keyboard is not smooth. Click the button to activate the bluetooth, then click again, and again, etc...until it finally connects. Far more hassle than it's worth. I wouldn't have purchased this if I had seen it in action in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Durga

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had been using it and it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belkin I Pad Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - the keyboard is better than my PC and my laptop combined. Keys are crisp and well placed. Not too smal or large. Even includes buttons that you always wished you had but no one else gives you. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jlemo

customer_reviews.title: Belkin Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great. It has a long battery life. It is easy to use and to connect to the iPad. I am not technology savvy and I have no trouble using this product. It was worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Kotula

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me a bluetooth keyboard from "brand X" It was fat, heavy and useless. This one is great. Exactly what I needed. It is light, thin, fast, and it does everything I was wanting it to do.
customer_reviews.author: jetjok4u

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. It was shipped fast and easy to set up. He can use for work and with his own IPad
customer_reviews.author: Khester

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the better cases out there because the keyboard is a decent size and doesn't cramp your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: dep864

customer_reviews.title: Great Case and Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard case is awesome! I bought it because I wanted a case that had brought the keyboard in it, but didn't sacrifice when I only wanted to use my iPad as a tablet. This is great and I highly reccomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: fell apart after 3 months. keyboard is a pain to keep charged separately.
customer_reviews.author: Tansy McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed unit with a great keyboard. However, I returned it because it made the iPad as heavy as my regular notebook laptop.
customer_reviews.author: nanP

customer_reviews.title: Issues with charging port
customer_reviews.text: After charging a few times I was unable to charge this keyboard because of the charging port in the keypad broke.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D.

customer_reviews.title: Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard works perfectly with my iPad 2. The battery life is very good, and the keyboard is very easy to use. The design is very nice, and gives the folio a look of something more expensive. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M

customer_reviews.title: Great case/keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Slightly heavy, makes your iPad a little bulky but good if your looking to turn your iPad into a laptop substitute.
customer_reviews.author: MissM

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Review
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest I was expecting something more substantive. The keyboard works effortlessly and has a nice feel. I have an IPAD 1 and IPAD 2 - and as an IPAD cover it really doesn't work with the original; the fit being too tight and frankly at this price it should do. The cover doesn't close very well so thats also a bit of a pain. But overall as a bluetooth keyboard it does the job but its an expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: AFH

customer_reviews.title: Dim keys
customer_reviews.text: Letters, numbers and symbols on the keys are dim, faded and hard to see. Not bright as in the ad pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for someone with an iPad. I'm sure they'll like it. I'll post additional feedback in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Defrancesco

customer_reviews.title: IPad keyboard Folio
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but not for me. I'm looking to sell it.. Tried it for a week and prefer just the iPad cover and touch keypad
customer_reviews.author: Rich s

product_meta.title: Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard Folio for New Apple iPad 2 / 3rd Generation, HD, 1080P, WiFi, 4G LTE, AT & T, Verizon
product_meta.description:
Get the comfort of tactile keyboard typing with the versatile and protective folio

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Belkin Keyboard Folio for iPad2 offers iPad users a convenient, comfortable alternative to touchscreen typing. This protective folio features a well-spaced QWERTY keyboard that allows you to type faster and with fewer errors than on your iPad's touchscreen. The keyboard connects to your iPad via a Bluetooth connection, eliminating the need for bulky cables. Ideal for iPad users who prefer the tactile response of a real keyboard, the Belkin Keyboard Folio will greatly enhance your iPad experience. 

BELKIN KEYBOARD FOLIO FOR IPAD2
AT A GLANCE:
 * Well-spaced TruType keys for faster, easier typing
 * Scissor-spring key design provides tactile feedback with each keystroke
 * Keyboard connects to iPad via Bluetooth for wireless operation
 * Tri-fold design allows for multiple iPad angles in both typing and viewing modes
 * Stylish folio protects iPad from scuffs and scratches


The unique, tri-fold design allows for different viewing options. View larger.TYPE COMFORTABLY ANYWHERE


Perfect for your lap or lounging, the Keyboard Folio makes your iPad even more versatile. View larger.
An integrated Bluetooth keyboard lets you type in comfort. View larger.
Stylishly protect your iPad 2.
View larger.WELL-SPACED KEYS ENSURE COMFORTABLE TYPING
The Belkin Keyboard Folio makes web-surfing, word-processing, chatting, and other typing-heavy iPad activities much easier. The keyboard features the traditional QWERTY layout, which computer users will instantly recognize.

Each evenly-spaced TruType key has been designed with a scissor-spring mechanism, which ensures tactile feedback with every keystroke. The keys are made of textured plastic to ensure a pleasant feel with every key touch, and the key travel has been engineered to create a laptop-like typing experience. The keyboard also has iPad-specific shortcut keys that allow you to easily copy and paste text, perform searches, adjust volume, lock the iPad screen, and more. 

ADJUSTABLE ANGLES FOR BOTH TYPING AND VIEWING MODES
The Keyboard Folio features a unique tri-fold design that allows for a variety of viewing angles on your iPad. The folio can hold your iPad upright for a clear view, or can tilt it at multiple angles for a familiar, laptop-like orientation. Fold out the keyboard for typing on your iPad, then tuck it away when you just want to view videos or pictures. When folded flat, the keyboard rests safely away from your iPad screen to ensure that it is well-protected when you are on the go. 

STYLISH, DURABLE FOLIO PROTECTS IPAD
With its attractive stitched border and sleek grey color, the folio is as stylish as it is functional. The folio has a soft exterior and a smooth inner lining, making it pleasing to the touch. Its stiff, durable construction helps protect your iPad from scratches, scuffs, and other types of wear. It even features a camera lens cutout that lets you snap photos while your iPad is in the case. Lightweight and form-fitting, the folio is designed to slip easily into a bag without adding unnecessary bulk.

BLUETOOTH CONNECTION FOR CABLE-FREE OPERATION
Thanks to its Bluetooth functionality, the keyboard eliminates the need for additional cables and wires. To connect the keyboard to your iPad, simply switch the keyboard on, and it will connect to your iPad via Bluetooth. In addition, the keyboard's rechargeable battery is able to hold a charge for up to 60 hours of active use or up to 2,000 hours of standby. The battery can easily be recharged using the included USB cable. 

The Belkin Keyboard Folio for iPad 2 is backed by a one-year limited warranty.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Belkin Keyboard Folio for iPad 2, USB charging cable, and user manual.
feature_bullets: Well-spaced TruType keys for comfortable typing
Unique tri-fold design tucks keyboard away to keep screen protected
Adjustable angles for viewing and typing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars106 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
